body_html:
It does indicate that histogram creation inside contexts, including cond
and while, is unsupported. We can add it to rnn() but dynamic_rnn will be
difficult without help from Yuan.

On Aug 19, 2016 11:29 AM, "eDz" notifications@github.com wrote:

if I removed the sequence_length, rnn() works, dynamic_rnn doesn't work.
maybe just give empty values to histogram when the part of graph wasn't
executed can fix this problem.

—

body:
It does indicate that histogram creation inside contexts, including cond
and while, is unsupported.  We can add it to rnn() but dynamic_rnn will be
difficult without help from Yuan.

On Aug 19, 2016 11:29 AM, "eDz" notifications@github.com wrote:

> if I removed the sequence_length, rnn() works, dynamic_rnn doesn't work.
> maybe just give empty values to histogram when the part of graph wasn't
> executed can fix this problem.
>
